titles.title: Entrepreneur Soldiers Empowerment Act
To direct the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to establish Veterans Business Outreach Centers and Technical Mentoring Assistance Committees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: 9/29/2005--Introduced. Entrepreneur Soldiers Empowerment Act - Amends the Small Business Act to direct the Administrator of the Small Business Administration, acting through the Associate Administrator for Veterans Business Development, to establish: (1) at least one Veterans Business Outreach Center in each geographic region; and (2) a Technical and Mentoring Assistance Committee in each District Office service location where no such Center has been established.
